meanings.definition: Not pleasing to the eye; lacking in beauty or attractiveness.
meanings.sent1: The unaesthetic painting had dull colors and rough lines.
meanings.sent2: The room's unaesthetic decor made it feel unwelcoming.
meanings.sent3: The unaesthetic outfit was a fashion disaster at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unaesthetic landscape resembled a chaotic mess of colors.
meanings.sent5: The unaesthetic design of the building was a blight on the city skyline.

meanings.definition: Lacking in artistic or aesthetic qualities.
meanings.sent1: The unaesthetic sculpture failed to evoke any emotion in viewers.
meanings.sent2: Her unaesthetic writing style lacked creativity and depth.
meanings.sent3: The unaesthetic dance performance left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The unaesthetic music sounded like a jumble of random notes.
meanings.sent5: The unaesthetic website design was difficult to navigate and visually unappealing.
